description: input method works wrong. can't input Chinese

Not so thrilled about it being an electron app, but well. One thing that works not so well is that quite often the channels aren't marked as "read" properly after I go into them and I have to manually right-click the channel and select "Mark read".
A bit buggy but better features than Slack + it's free
summary: A bit buggy but better features than Slack + it's free
